faqs.heading: FAQs About Santa Hug Video Generator

questions.question: What is the Santa Hug Video Generator?
questions.answer: The Santa Hug Video Generator is an AI video effect. Upload a photo, and it turns it into a cute video where Santa gives a hug to the person or pet in your picture.

questions.question: What kind of photo should I upload for the best results?
questions.answer: Use a clear, front-facing photo of one person or pet. High-quality images where the face and upper body are visible work best.

questions.question: Is the Santa Hug Video Generator free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! When you sign up for a free account, you get free credits to try the Santa Hug Video Generator and create your first video.

questions.question: How long does it take to generate the Santa Hug video?
questions.answer: It depends on the photo, but our AI is fast. Most videos are ready in under a minute.

questions.question: Can I use this tool on my smartphone?
questions.answer: Yes! The tool works on any device. You can upload a photo and make your Santa Hug video from your phone, tablet, or computer.
